channel.title: Telecom on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Telecom on FinanClub

item.title: NOK
item.description: score:40 Chances: Nokia’s return to the German smartphone market and the global 5G patent cross-licensing deal with Oppo and OnePlus indicate potential for growth in the mobile networks segment. The company’s focus on cloud and network services, as well as technology licensing, shows a strategic shift towards software and services, which could drive future revenue.
